name: Parotta
description: Flaky and soft layered flatbread, a South Indian classic often paired with salna (curry).

name: Kothu Parotta
description: Chopped parotta mixed with eggs, vegetables, and spicy gravy, cooked on a hot iron skillet.

name: Chicken Salna
description: A flavorful chicken curry made with aromatic spices, perfect for pairing with parotta or rice.

name: Idiyappam
description: String hoppers made from rice flour, soft and delicate, often served with coconut milk or salna.

name: Mutton Chukka
description: Spicy, dry-roasted mutton cooked with a blend of traditional spices and served as a starter or side dish.

name: Egg Dosa
description: Crispy dosa topped with egg, seasoned with pepper and served with chutney and sambar.

name: Veechu Parotta
description: Thin, hand-stretched parotta, soft and delicious, often enjoyed with spicy curry or kurma.

name: Fish Fry
description: Crispy and spicy fried fish marinated in South Indian spices, a perfect side dish or starter.

name: Podi Idli
description: Soft idlis coated with spicy podi (powdered lentils and spices), perfect for a quick snack.

name: Chicken 65
description: Crispy, deep-fried spicy chicken bites marinated with a blend of yogurt and South Indian spices.

name: Sambar Rice
description: A comforting South Indian dish made with rice, mixed vegetables, and aromatic sambar.

name: Rasam
description: A tangy and spicy South Indian soup made with tamarind, tomatoes, and spices, served as a starter or with rice.

name: Mushroom Pepper Fry
description: A spicy and flavorful dish made with mushrooms, black pepper, and aromatic spices, perfect as a side or snack.

name: Prawn Thokku
description: A spicy and tangy prawn curry made with tomatoes and a rich blend of South Indian spices.

name: Onion Uttapam
description: Thick, fluffy uttapam topped with caramelized onions and green chilies, served with chutney and sambar.

name: Pongal
description: A savory rice and lentil dish tempered with black pepper, cumin, and ghee, served with chutney and sambar.

name: Masala Dosa
description: Crispy dosa stuffed with a spiced potato filling, served with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Vadai
description: Crispy deep-fried lentil fritters, perfect as a snack or served with coconut chutney and sambar.

name: Chettinad Chicken Curry
description: A spicy and aromatic chicken curry made with freshly ground Chettinad spices and coconut.

name: Ragi Mudde
description: Traditional finger millet balls served with spicy sambar or curry, a nutritious and filling meal.
